pkgmetadata.longdescription: Armory is an open source wallet management platform for the Bitcoin network. It was designed from the ground up to provide the highest level of security for heavily-invested Bitcoin users, while still maintaining a high degree of usability and convenience. Its ease of use and plethora of advanced features makes it one of the most popular alternative Bitcoin clients, and is featured on the main Bitcoin website, http://bitcoin.org/clients.html.
